Methods

Process(IObservable<Tuple<int, int>>)

Sets the gate and trigger values in SpikeGLX

public IObservable<Tuple<int, int>> Process(IObservable<Tuple<int, int>> source)

Parameters

source IObservable<Tuple<int, int>>

A sequence of Tuples of two Ints used to set the gate and trigger (in that order). -1: no change 0: set low 1: set high

Returns

IObservable<Tuple<int, int>>

An observable sequence that is identical to the source sequence but where there is an additional side effect of setting the gate and trigger values in SpikeGLX.
